about_the_game:
It takes time to build a ship or port from scratch with a map chip, right?
This DLC includes a map of the ship and harbor completed from the beginning!

This DLC comes with a png file that models the map and a jpg file of the battle background.

[smap & png]
1. Harbor Map
2. Ship Map

[battle background]
1. at_sea.jpg
2. harbor_town.jpg
3. on_deck.jpg

*How to Use (for SRPG Studio users)*

1. Launch SRPG Studio.
In the upper left corner of the application, there is a File menu.
Open the menu to access the DLC, you will find "SRPG Studio Ship Material Collection", select it.

2. Go to the "SRPG Studio Ship Material Collection" folder on your desktop.
Drag "Harbor Map.smap" from the "Harbor Map" folder and "Ship Map.smap" from the "Ship Map" folder into Windows Explorer. Then, drop these files into SRPG Studio.

3. When you drop the file, a dialog will appear asking you to confirm that you want to import the smap file.
If you select OK here. A new, completed map data will be created.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Microsoft® Windows® Vista(sp2) / 7 / 8 / 10 (32bit/64bit)
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Storage: 20 MB available space

short_description: Material for ship maps and sea maps!
